newsitem.title: USA: Tuesday Morning Q1 same-store sales up.
newsitem.headline: Tuesday Morning Q1 same-store sales up.

text.p: Discount retail chain Tuesday Morning Corp said Tuesday its comparable store sales rose 23 percent during the first quarter, representing the third consecutive year in which the results have risen at double-digit percentage rates.
It said total sales reached $47.2 million during the period ended March 31, a 33-percent rise from the same period last year.
Tuesday, which attributed the sales performance to improvement in product selection and higher efficiency, said it expected first-quarter margins to be consistent with last year.
